column1: EVTDESC980000;Direct immigration adds two new province buildings to the game. The province selector determines where pops will move from and the immigrator determines where pops will move to. To have pops move to the colonies the admin slider needs to be at 99% or greater
column2: to have them move between states it needs to be 98% or less. To move accepted pops the education slider needs to be at 99% or more
column3: to move unaccepted pops it needs to be at 98% or less.
